column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////For the third visit
column2: we finally got there during breakfast hours and when it wasn't too busy. Got the breakfast sandwich and it was amazeballs (rating: 5/5). That itself might have relieved all my frustration from the previous visits
column3: but then I got knocked down again when I realized my freshly squeezed orange juice came in the smallest glass ever :[ The other party ordered a yogurt parfait (rating: 2/5) but was disheartened by it
column4: adding packets of sugar to its over tart taste.
